name: Star Shooter
description:
Star Shooter is a game where you need to destroy stars and asteroids that are falling down at your planet. Get gold, buy new battle ships and enjoy the game.

This is one of my first projects that I've written in C++  long ago and successfully forgotten about it. Finally, I finished the project :) To tell you the truth, I expected to do it much bigger, add some levels, bonuses, modes and etc...

This is a fantastic console game.
